com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr

Interface NodeCallback<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The result type.

    public interface NodeCallback<T>
    A callback used to events for individual repository nodes and return a typed result.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T doInSessionWithNode(javax.jcr.Session session, javax.jcr.Node node)
      The method that handles the callback event.

                      throws Exception
        The method that handles the callback event.
        Parameters:
        session - The session.
        node - The node.

        The result.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error handling the callback event.
